title: Europa League power rankings: Manchester United, Sevilla, Arsenal – who tops our list of contenders?
text:
It’s that time of year when Thursday nights become fun again – the Europa League is back!

48 teams begin the tournament dreaming of Gdansk glory, with 15 games to negotiate if they want to lift a gleaming trophy in Poland next May.

But which of them are genuine contenders?

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Manchester United, Arsenal and Wolves are the Premier League’s representatives, while Celtic and Rangers are leading the Scottish charge in continental competition. Will Sevilla secure another Europa League crown? Hope springs eternal in Rome – is this Lazio or Roma’s year?

Here are our power rankings of EVERY Europa League team ahead of the group stage:

Shape Created with Sketch. Power Rankings: Europa League Group Stage Show all 49 left Created with Sketch. right Created with Sketch. Shape Created with Sketch.
